${ModID}:SeeingTheThreads.NAME: Seeing The Threads
${ModID}:SeeingTheThreads.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:BrowsingFate.NAME: Browsing Fate
${ModID}:BrowsingFate.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:ButterflyEffect.NAME: Butterfly Effect
${ModID}:ButterflyEffect.DESCRIPTION: {@@}This turn, whenever you play an Attack, put a random card from your draw pile into your hand.{!Upgrades!|<1= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:FlowOfTime.NAME: Flow Of Time
${ModID}:FlowOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, draw !M! cards.
